FKE Seminar Series – Dr. Lim Cheng Siong
========================================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | Jun 28, 2024 | [Anouncement](https://fke.utm.my/category/anouncement/)
, [FKESeminarSeries](https://fke.utm.my/category/fkeseminarseries/)
, [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/06/fkeseminar-9July-resized.jpg)

Assalamualaikum and Salam Sejahtera,

All academic staff and students are cordially invited to attend a seminar organized by the FKE Seminar Committee, which is scheduled as follows:

Speaker: Dr Lim Cheng Siong  
Title: Rapid Prototyping: Its Importance and Challenges  
Date: 9 July 2024 (Tuesday)  
Time: 2.30 PM – 3.30 PM  
Venue: Active Learning Classroom, Level 5, P19a  
Moderator: Dr Fazilah Hassan

We are looking forward to your participation. Thank you.  
(CPD hour is awarded for staff, postgraduate students’ attendance will be recorded to fulfill the faculty’s requirement)
